    HALAttrsGen
  TD_FILE
    "HALAttrs.td"

)

  NAME
    HALInterfacesGen
  TD_FILE
    "HALInterfaces.td"
  OUTS
    --gen-attr-interface-decls HALAttrInterfaces.h.inc
    --gen-attr-interface-defs HALAttrInterfaces.cpp.inc
    --gen-op-interface-decls HALOpInterfaces.h.inc
    --gen-op-interface-defs HALOpInterfaces.cpp.inc

)

  OUTS
